meanings.definition: A characteristic or attribute of an object or substance.
meanings.sent1: The unique properties of the diamond made it valuable.
meanings.sent2: The physical properties of the metal determine its strength.
meanings.sent3: The magical properties of the potion turned the frog into a prince.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was one of her most valuable properties.
meanings.sent5: The detective used the distinct properties of the footprint to solve the case.

meanings.definition: A piece of real estate or land.
meanings.sent1: She inherited a large piece of properties from her grandparents.
meanings.sent2: The company invested in commercial properties in the city.
meanings.sent3: The haunted properties on the hill were rumored to be cursed.
meanings.sent4: The vast properties of the national park stretched for miles.
meanings.sent5: The valuable properties along the beach were in high demand.

meanings.definition: A quality or trait that defines a person or thing.
meanings.sent1: His honesty is one of his best properties.
meanings.sent2: The unique properties of her artwork set it apart from the rest.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous properties of the cat always kept its owner on their toes.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was a key property in achieving her goals.
meanings.sent5: The calming properties of the music helped reduce stress levels.
